task.title: Leveraging your API subscription
task.shortdesc: After receiving your API Key, you can view the REST tab to view the Swagger definition to test the API on the API details page.

taskbody.context: Once a subscription request has been approved, you will want to validate the associated APIs functionality and begin incorporating its use within your applications. To ensure proper execution of the API and necessary policies are employed, the API key would typically be included in the header as part of the actual API call invocation.

step.cmd: From the Developer Portal, click API Catalog.
View the available APIs or type your search filter in the Search APIs by name field to more quickly navigate to your intended API.
Click on the API card for the API for which you have both a valid API Key and API authentication information in order to view the Overview and REST documentation for that API.
Click REST to view the Swagger definition.

postreq.p: For information on how to use the Swagger definition, view Swagger UI usage.
